page.title: 02 Our School
page.content: Our{School}is called Mistley Norman{Primary School.}The school got its name from the old school which was built by Edward Norman in 1856. We have been in the new school since 1981. The new school is shaped like a spaceship. There are 5 classrooms called bases joined together. The hall is used for P.E., assemblies and dinners. The hall is in the middle and the 5 classrooms are around the edge. There are three extensions which have roofs made of glass. The playing field is for sports. We have a visual aids room, a staff room and an office. There are 148{children,}5 teachers, one secretary,1 cleaner and 10 mums who come to help with our{education}by helping with Reading, Art and Crafts and Sewing.
